item.title: Ethic problems in generative AI
item.description: DRAFT just for review :) Ethic problems in generative AI Disclaimer: these are free thoughts and questions about the ethics of generative AI. Feel free to be be in disagreement with that and speak about it with your friends, it’s the only way to improve the discussion about this topic! What is ethics? The difference between good and bad, Lexica.art Ethics is the branch of philosophy that deals with moral principles and values.

item.title: Quasi estranei game
item.description: Quasi estranei game It was Thursday evening when discovered from the web this card game: WE ARE NOT REALLY STRANGERS What’s the purpose of that game? From their official website: We’re Not Really Strangers is a purpose driven card game and movement all about empowering meaningful connections. Three carefully crafted levels of questions and wildcards that allow you to deepen your existing relationships and create new ones. Seems interesting! How it’s made?

item.title: Website Refactoring
item.description: r3v.it refactoring Hello world! This is only an example of blog post for website refactoring. In this website I’ll put writings about things that I like and love. You will not find the answers of you most deep questions, the the “best resources” and “exciting posts”. Just some thoughts and hopes. It’s not perfect, but it’s mine. This is my brain And it’s fine It’s where I spend a vast majority of my time
